---
title: "Happy Gentoo"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(emojifont)
library(themeAutumnColors)
```

```{r}
# Map Gentoos

penguins %>% 
  filter(species == "Gentoo") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = body_mass_g, 
             y = flipper_length_mm))+
  geom_point()+
  annotate("text",
           label = emoji("penguin"), 
           cex=25, 
           family='EmojiOne',
           x = 6100,
           y = 215)+
  theme_autumncolors()
```
